definitions.title: verb
definitions.body: withhold, hold back (NH id.; Zinj. [[מנע]] DHM:Sendsch. 60; Ar. mana9a; Sab. [[מנע]] Levy-Os:ZMG xix. 1865, 268; Aram [[מְנַע]])—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf ´[[מ]] Ge 30:2; sf. [[מְנׇעַ֫נִי]] 1Sa 25:34; [[מָנַ֫עְתָּ]] Ps 21:3, Ne 9:20, etc.; Impf. [[יִמְנַע־]] Ps 84:12; sf. [[יִמְנׇעֵָ֫נִי]] 2Sa 13:13 etc.; Imv. [[מְנַע]] Pr 1:15; [[מִנְעִי]] Je 2:25, Je 31:16; Pt. [[מׂנֵעַ]] Pr 11:26, Je 48:10; —withhold, sq. [[מִן]] Ge 30:2 (obj. [[פְּרִי־בֶטֶן]]), Am 4:7 (rain), Ne 9:20 (manna; all subj. ´[[י]]); Job 22:7 (bread), 1Ki 20:7 (obj. om.; both hum. subj.), so Je 48:10 (sword), Ec 2:10 (heart), Je 5:25 (good), Pr 3:27 (id., Pr 1:15 (foot); Je 2:25 (id.) Je 31:16 (voice); further, 2Sa 13:13 (woman), Je 42:4 (knowledge), Job 31:16 (poor), Pr 23:13 (correction), obj. om. ´[[י]] subj. Pr 30:7; [[מִן]] om. Pr 11:26 (obj. corn); cf. Ps 21:3 subj. ´[[י]] (obj. [[אֲרֶשֶׁת שְׂפָתָיו]] ‖ [[נׇתַן תַּאֲוַת לֵב]]), Job 20:13 fig. (wickedness), Ez Eze 31:15 ´[[י]] subj. (obj. rivers); obj. pers. ´[[י]] subj. sq. [[מן]] Nu 24:11; sq. [[מִן]] + inf. 1Sa 25:26, 1Sa 25:34; sq. [[לְ]], subj. ´[[י]] Ps 84:12 (good).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִמְנַע]] Joe 1:13; Impf. [[יִמָּנַע]] Job 38:15, etc.; be withholden sq. [[מִן]], subj. [[מִנְחָה]] etc. Joe 1:13; light from wicked Job 38:15; Nu 22:16 (sq. [[מִן]] + inf.); subj. showers ([[רְבִבִים]]) Je 3:3.
